entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Halifax Stanfield Int'l Airport 08:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12 except 7 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 12 except 7 along the coast. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening and ending overnight then 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Risk of a thundershower after midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Monday 02 May 2016
